act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 司机先生，请问我去人民公园还有几站？
item.pinyin: Sījī xiānsheng, qǐngwèn wǒ qù Rénmín gōngyuán háiyǒu jǐ zhàn?
Ò, nǐ zuò cuò chē le.

item.hanzi: 没关系，你可以在南京路站下，然后换22路车。
item.pinyin: Méi guānxi, nǐ kěyǐ zài Nánjīng lù zhàn xià, ránhòu huàn èr shí èr lù chē.
Dào Nánjīng lù háiyǒu jǐ zhàn?

item.hanzi: 您到时候能叫我一下吗？
item.pinyin: Nín dào shíhòu néng jiào wǒ yīxià ma?
